00035 // A class for output to a user defined (callback) function.
00036 class XALAN_TRANSFORMER_EXPORT XalanTransformerOutputStream : public XalanOutputStream
00037 {
00038 public:
00039 
00048     XalanTransformerOutputStream(
00049         MemoryManagerType&          theManager,
00050         void*                       theOutputHandle, 
00051         XalanOutputHandlerType      theOutputHandler,
00052         XalanFlushHandlerType       theFlushHandler = 0);
00053 
00054

00059

00061     writeData(
00062             const char*         theBuffer,
00063             size_type           theBufferLength);
00064

00066     doFlush();

00072

00075

00077

00079
